about_the_game:
Get a taste of our parascientific fairy tale where you solve problems of cosmic proportions!
Demo completely revamped since the early version of the game showcased during Steam Summer Festival.
It features: 2 complete planets, voiced narration, music by Thomas Regin (Blackwell series, Unavowed), as well as lots and lots of small tweaks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek (R) Audio equivalent or better
  • Additional Notes: VR Required, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer; USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or better port
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek (R) Audio equivalent or better
  • Additional Notes: VR Required, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer; USB Port: 1x USB 2.0 or better port
